Articles.Content:
I always wondered..Can you get into orbit using RCS only.

Apparently yes,but now i challenge YOU to go there.

For those who will have a real tough time getting there may use a small fuel tank and small engine.(Oscar-B and ant engine recommended)

If you did manage to do it post a screenshot and your time.

Optional:.craft file download.

Thank you for reading and good luck!
this shouldnt be possible anymore. it used to be - due to an error with RCS

From Kerbin, forget it, can't be done any more unless you cheat and then what's the point?

From the Mun or another low G world, sure it's easy enough, not really a challenge at all.

At least try to do your challenge yourself to see if it's even feasible, you'd very quickly find that this one just isn't
I did,but it took REALLY long.But then again i'm not the KSP pro

I did,but it took REALLY long.But then again i'm not the KSP pro

you can't achieve Kerbin orbit with RCS alone.
You did, however used to be able to do it. So maybe ThatNoob did it then. (In the interest of fairness)

You did, however used to be able to do it. So maybe ThatNoob did it then. (In the interest of fairness)

Yes,i tried it when it could be done,but now i'm tryiing it in 0.19.1.54
